name: Subrace MOD for Enhanced Edition Games

fr_FR.description: Voici un mod qui propose des sous-races pour les personnages.

components.100: Change les couleurs de la sous-race (Cheveux et Peau)
components.200: Ne pas changer les couleurs de la sous-race (Cheveux et Peau)

en_US.description: Here's a mod that offers subraces for characters.

components.choice_0: Subrace mod for Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition (BG1, BG:SoD, BG2, EET)
components.200: No change subrace colors (Hair and Skin)

zh_CN.description: 这是一个为角色提供亚种族的模组。

components.choice_0: Subrace mod for Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition (BG1, BG:SoD, BG2, EET)
components.200: No change subrace colors (Hair and Skin)

components.choice_0: Mod de Sub-raças para Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition (BG1, BG:SoD, BG2, EET)
components.100: Alterar cores das sub-raças (Cabelo e Pele)
components.200: Não alterar cores das sub-raças (Cabelo e Pele)
